name: Public Access News
description:
*Update: Animations should be fixed now. Also added a small in-game score feedback thing.

My submission for SA GameDev Challenge IX!

I didn't have time to complete it and don't really know what I'm doing. It's very short and simple, there's no audio and the text is actually placeholder stuff. It also seems to bug out a little in some browsers, where the selectable objects end up in the wrong place. It's all a bit poo.

On the plus side, I sort've finished it! Yay!

*Instructions*

Click text to advance. That's about it.
